name: The Glitch: Babyrobot
description:
This is a prototype that we made for BUG Jr. 2019 Spring Finals.

You are a new-built robot and different than others, you are self-conscious.

To leave the lab, you have to solve the puzzles.

We couldn't include the whole project file because of size limit but there is a script folder which includes all the scripts i built up.

Controls

Use WASD to move, mouse to look around and F to pick up/use items.
Some puzzles have different inputs that the player should pay attention and figure out.
